content:
TextShadowType Enum

Definition

Specifies the type of shadow to add to text.

In this Article

public enum TextShadowType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
TextShadowType

Remarks

The TextShadowType values represent the return values of the GetEnumValue method when it is called with an argument value of System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty.

Fields

Continuous

A continuous shadow is drawn.
None

No shadow is drawn.
Single

A single shadow is drawn.
